description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Todd Montgomery - Co-Author of Aeron

ABSTRACT
C++ has been undergoing quite a lot of change in the last several years - C++11, C++14, and even C++17. These changes present opportunities for new designs and behaviors. But, how do these new opportunities actually pan out [...]
Download slides and read the full abstract here:
http://gotocon.com/chicago-2016/presentations/show_presentation.jsp?oid=7430

title: Using Modern C++ In Anger
